comments.body: SMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMART
I think the warden should drop like some kind of ingot witch could be used for making armor and weapons.
so far I love the warden trailer
i think that the warden should drop his head give us blindess and speed 10
I had the same idea
I would only have dyable blocks and items be affected
How about they make a new type of glow block. block is made by surrounding glass and wool around a sac and they area also dyable....
I think they should be used to craft a Potion of Illumination.
cranzag good idea... now that the goat has been given functionality with the mutton drop, we need to turn our focus to the glow squid, and this seems like the most viable idea.
well, i was literally about to suggest this lol
i still don't know why this idea is so underated
Change my name now please.
Perhaps, the Baby Warden is friendly, curious, and will approach you in response to vibrations if you are interested in anything.
It would be cute
Interesting.
I like the idea of there being different forms of structures made out of bone but adding a bunch of items that have no use like raptor claws seems a bit far from the scope of the Minecraft theme.
Minecraft is a sandbox, so adding more blocks and items is a good thing.

Nice Idea! The biggest problem with the trident is that it's so rare, by the time you get it you probably have fully enchanted bows. And even if you're lucky enough to get it early you won't be able to use it because you can't repair it. It's ranged abilities are also pretty useless without loyalty. I would much more prefer that you can get an early game, weaker trident craft able with copper, it can also act as an upgrade to the trident.(The smithing table is very under used currently)!
I like the idea of both a netherite and a copper trident existing, but maybe each should be it's own upgrade
amethyst is also an idea with this
that could be a nice update for the trident you have my vote
This should probably apply to all stews. They either could reset it or pause it temporarily.
I think it should pause it. Provided how useless stew is this should help it be noticed and maybe used in some scenarios
Stews should be stackable, like other foods.

Hmm I think this could work.

Many it has a small structure like a witch hut but more cavy.
Honestly i think it shouldn't be a villager it doesn't rlly fit the theme of the villager example villager up top ..... In middle and piglin on the bottom.
Thumbs up for realism and sketchy cave traders!
I think it sould be under ground musroom villagers and musroom villages and new glow musrooms

A few things, first of all is that I would like to see more gem tools/armor added, and similar to what you have suggested, I do believe that they should give different bonuses. However, I believe that it should be in the form of all tools and armors having more varying stats. Certain gem tools could have higher luck, or initial fortune value, whereas armors could protect more from different sources, such as projectile protection but as a base level. They could even add weight, where different armors slow you down more than others. More importantly however, are they gems you, and everyone, seem to be choosing for geodes. The amethyst geodes added are quartz based, as are most geodes in general. You would not find a ruby geode, a topaz geode, or a sapphire geode. Instead, any new geodes added should be of other quartz based minerals, chalcedony, onyx, citrine, jasper, and so on.
I think that this is a great idea it would be fun to play around with
The idea is great but please spell glass the correct way
The sonic boom is an instant damage attack, not a projectile. Its particles never harm entities directly.
"her" ?
This has been added in 1.19.
One thing about boat travel on ice that has always bothered me is not being able to go up blocks. It would be great if the sleigh was able to go up bigger steps like horses.
It will also make it a little more creepy. I like it!
also the copper golem in archeology and it even appears buried in a rusty way
killing them is a little far... but i like the idea
Maybe not adding a ton of new gemstones, but I would really like the idea of having redstone, lapis, or diamond geodes...
Now that I think about about it, maybe just the amethyst quartz and citrine geodes.
good idea but what will the zipline be used for and how will you craft it. plus where are all of the other mobs.

I really need this!!! I want thermal caves so much! Please Mojang, add thermal caves! And I love the idea of the blobfish too!!! I’d love to see them in the game, I think mobs are harder to implement, but hopefully they release those cute chubby fishes. 

I’m not sure about the drop tho… I like the idea of ziplines, but I don’t like how it relates to a fish… Another idea for the drop could be fat or something like that, fat would give a lot of saturation but it would only restore a little bit of hunger. Fat could also be used to prevent freezing in powder snow or to prevent other creatures from freezing, I’m not sure about this last one tho
the block is a zipline, its used for transport like a minecart but you stick to the bottom.
YESSSS but no ziplines.

Zipline idea is weird but blobfish is cool. It could look like a normal fish in the water but collapse when it's brought up to the surface like real ones do. The drop is some sort of blubber that gives freezing resistance when eaten, as well as lots of saturation. It could even brew potions of freezing resistance or saturation!
I like the frost charm idea, but I don’t like it having its own unique spot, maybe just the offhand spot, or maybe the slot appears only when the frost charm is present in the inventory?
This would be an amazing feature
Yes! I hate having lots of beacon beams around my base.
Aku mau donlod
Klk
Si seria genial tener nuevos encantamientos
What about one called 'How low can you go?' for when the player gets down below y-level -32
You should get “The Slayer Of The Beast” for killing the warden
These could be Bedrock achievements. "The Slayer of the Beast" will be a 1.19, not a 1.18.

Good Idea!
I just really don't see the logic of adding woodcutters villagers in this biome because they don't have that many trees but it could be a good idea for a taiga village. I think they instead should add beekeeper villagers in these villages as this biome have a lot of flowers.

i think there should be a new feature in a future update a melting system for tin and copper to make bronze just as in real life how you can melt them together you can make bronze ,and it make a bunch of new opportunitys for new tools and blocks ' it could be a perfect time later in the future for tin a new ore
Yes and when copper armour/tools lose durability, they could change their visual state (4 times). > 75% equipment would be totally orange and < 25% durability would have the tools turn totally green.
Axolotls don't have scales in real life, they have gills.
I think axolotl armor would look great with the Trident
if axolotls have tools axe will be axeolotl lol i love it
i thought this would be armor FOR your axolotl, since they fight stuff
